subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Lolo Jones has received far greater publicity than any other American track and field athlete competing in the London Games, based not on achievement but on her exotic beauty and on a marketing campaign.
snippet: Lolo Jones has received far greater publicity than any other American track and field athlete competing in the London Games, based not on achievement but on her exotic beauty and on a marketing campaign.
